title: r/Choosingbeggars "DRAW ME FOR FREE" "lol ok"
description:
r/Choosingbeggars I feel sorry for professional artists sometimes. Can you imagine how often people come to them asking for free work? The artist in today's episode is tired of being used by choosing beggars, so he decides to give them exactly what they ask for -- and what they pay for! Terrible art for terrible people. What's the worst they could do... ask for a refund?

Download Honey for free at Joinhoney.com/rslash
